overview:
Roger is a software industry veteran with over 20 years of Sales, Alliance, Business Development, Support and Professional Services management experience. He has a proven track record of helping leading SaaS and Software companies build meaningful, long-lasting relationships with customers and partners by helping them overcome the challenges that they face in deploying cloud services.

Roger joined Okta in early 2010 to help build a world class sales and partner organization and ensure that Okta customers are happy and successful.

relationships.title: Vice President, Business Development & Strategic Accounts
